item.title: TW: We've Written Volumes (in Blood and Scars and Ink), Derek/Stiles, NC-17, 25K
item.dc:creator: meitachi
item.description:
Stiles is on his back on hard-packed dirt. He's cold and there are leaves stuck to his neck and there's a four inch gash in his side that he thinks he can feel his ribs through. There's so much blood around him he feels like he's floating on a pond and everything is so much dimmer above him than it was a minute ago, which is saying something because he's in the dark center of the forest in the middle of the night. And the worst of it is that he's alone, totally alone with the smell of his own blood drowning him and the soft side of him run through by a tree.
As his eyes slip shut, the last thing he thinks is, "This is going to kill my dad."
item.dc:subject: fandom:teenwolf pairing:derek/stiles rating:nc-17 author:notthequiettype !♥ h/c

item.title: Disentanglement - rageprufrock
item.dc:creator: deerang2002
item.description:
After the abject shitshow of Palo Alto, Eduardo's plans are to stop proving his father right about all his life decisions, shut up, graduate, and keep abusing the slow-healing wound from Mark's knife in the back until all the scar tissue is numb from dead nerve endings. //
As with all of Pru's work, I'm left wordless and full of feelings (not sure what type or kind) at the end of it. It's amazing and you should read it. Also, seems rather apropos that the last fic I'll probably ever read in this fandom is by Pru.
item.dc:subject: thesocialnetwork author:rageprufrock eduardo/omc ***** gen

item.title: Ego Driven Development - Deliberate Software
item.dc:creator: jonschoning
item.description: "Not Invented Here" syndrome Little to no test coverage of domain logic No dedicated UI person for external user interfaces or no actual user testing No dedicated QA for externally-facing software "Ivory Tower" or "Architecture Astronaut" team leads Broad skill level spectrum No pair programming Micro-management in some areas, no management in others Agile “Lite” Low Joel Test score
